attributes.additional_details:
Lets get on it with and give the entire union the opportunity to vote on the continued membership of the Scots in the United Kingdom...

They dont want to be in it and quite frankly I am fed up with subsidising this belligerent and ungrateful clan of miserable whingers.

They receive huge subsidies per capita for everything from health to education - their parliment spends our money giving their population benefits the rest of us would kill for.

So lets all have the chance to have a say - they Scots if they want to go and the rest of us if we want to see them go.

And if they do - then the terms should be equitable and fair for us all and not weighted unfairly in Scotlands favour - if they want to go then fine - but their independance should be at their cost and they must support themselves - the rest of the Union should not be expected to support and subsidise their desire for independance - financially or otherwise.

I say go and the sooner the better !
